lead_paragraph: New owners, like the Charlotte Bobcats’ Michael Jordan, face the prospect of not being able to make up short-term losses by selling for a hefty profit.
snippet: New owners, like the Charlotte Bobcats’ Michael Jordan, face the prospect of not being able to make up short-term losses by selling for a hefty profit.
